data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: Describe your favorite thing to do on rainy days. What makes this activity ideal for a rainy day? Why do you enjoy this activity?
data.answer: My favorite thing to do on a rainy day is to go to a café and order a coffee and just sit around and feel relaxed. The reason why it is an ideal activity to do on a rainy day is that it sets the mood and a rainy day could help me feel calm and relaxed and forget about all my worries. Therefore, I enjoy this activity very much on rainy days.
